dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3667 IH: Strengthening American Nuclear Energy Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Donalds introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Science, Space, and Technology, Armed Services, Foreign Affairs, Financial Services, and Education and Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To codify certain Executive orders relating to nuclear energy.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Strengthening American Nuclear Energy Act.

section.header: Codification of Executive orders relating to nuclear energy
section.text: The following Executive orders, signed on May 23, 2025, shall have the force and effect of law:

paragraph.text: The Executive order entitled Reforming Nuclear Reactor Testing at the Department of Energy.
The Executive order entitled Deploying Advanced Nuclear Reactor Technologies for National Security.
The Executive order entitled Ordering the Reform of the Nuclear Regulatory Commission.
The Executive order entitled Reinvigorating the Nuclear Industrial Base.
